title: Explained: Targeting big tech, what EU’s landmark Digital Act aims to achieve - The Indian Express
content:
1. Explained: Targeting big tech, what EU’s landmark Digital Act aims to achieve  The Indian Express
  2. EU agrees on landmark bill that takes aim at Big Tech  Moneycontrol
  3. EU agrees on landmark law to curb Big Tech giants dominance - regulations on Google, Meta, Amazon, Apple, etc.  Times Now
  4. Analysis: New EU rules regulating U.S. tech giants likely to set global standard  Reuters
  5. Europe's Digital Markets Act Takes a Hammer to Big Tech  WIRED
  6. View Full coverage on Google News
description: The DMA’s focus is on companies termed as ‘gatekeepers’, which include Apple, Facebook, Google, etc. These companies will have to comply with the new rules.
